hackathon-description-text: The Global Hackathon series is community-centered event. It is run by local event organizers around the world. New York is one of the 9 cities to participate in the first season of the hackathon series.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: How AI will change the way we work
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of AI in the Workplace

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Humans are usually very good at recognizing emotions through facial expressions, tones, gestures etc. But, what about computers? Probably not so much... yet.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=369 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: 1. Hack supports social good, diversity and/or inclusivity.
2. Disrupts the status quo for a problem, industry or demographic.
3. Challenge to build from a technical standpoint.
4. Product effectively solves a problem in an innovative way

hackathon-location-address: 369 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA
